TopicTitle: Small Hardpoint on Spaceship breaks in 1.0.5 after upgraded from 1.0.4

Articles.Content:
KSP version: Windows  64-bit, it's Steam

A detailed explanation of what happened and what you were trying to accomplish:

when I upgraded from 1.0.4 to 1.0.5, the Small Hardpoints are separated from the ship body, and side fuel tanks/engines are gone after detached from the ship body,but it was intact from 1.0.4.

I didnt install any parts mods, only mechjeb and other populer mods installed,so I will say it is unmodded problem, problem is probably in the redesign of Small Hardpoint.

A screenshot of your craft or any relevant screens

 

the first one with 4 side engines connected by small hardpoint  is the screenshot in 1.0.4 

the second one is the screenshot in 1.0.5, small hardpoint is detached and side enginesare gone.

 

A .craft file or save files if relevant

here is the saving file: this issue is found in  Chen Du profile

https://app.box.com/s/zk97ie4590kwvxlc8f9clkmnwdtv34ft

The ouput_log.txt or player.log file KSP creates when it launches and, if applicable, the crash log KSP has generated when the program crashed

https://app.box.com/s/fgmczfjr6v6jqmae3h011d5azlo9bto7

A detailed list of system specifications

OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit
CPU: Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E3-1230 V2 @ 3.30GHz (8)
RAM: 8140
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (1991MB)
SM: 30 (Direct3D 9.0c [nvd3dum.dll 9.18.13.5012])
RT Formats: ARGB32, Depth, ARGBHalf, RGB565, Default, DefaultHDR, ARGBFloat, RGFloat, RGHalf, RFloat, RHalf, R8

 

Are you running a clean installation, or have you updated and some of your persistence or craft files might be older versions, if so which version(s)

from 1.0.4.861 (WindowsPlayer)  

to 1.0.5.1028 (WindowsPlayer) Steam

Is this a common issue?

Is there any way to fix it?
